name: ensure
description:
Creates a new `Array` from a value that might not be an iterable.
*Example
documentation:
Creates a new `Array` from a value that might not be an iterable.
*Example**

```ts
import { Array } from "effect"

console.log(Array.ensure("a")) // ["a"]
console.log(Array.ensure(["a"])) // ["a"]
console.log(Array.ensure(["a", "b", "c"])) // ["a", "b", "c"]
```
